issue.title: [C++] Potential overflow in bit_stream_utils.h multiplication.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10077](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10077). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We use a literal "8" for BitsPerByte which is interpretted as int32_t which can overflow.
